lemma trss_find_return: "\<lbrakk> ((s@r,c),w,(r,c'))\<in>trcl (trss fg); !!wa wb ch. \<lbrakk> w=wa@wb; ((s,c),wa,([],ch))\<in>trcl (trss fg); ((r,ch),wb,(r,c'))\<in>trcl (trss fg) \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P" \<comment> \<open>If @{term "s=[]"}, the proposition follows trivially\<close>
